name: Pimp My Perma
description:
Pimp my Perma was realised in under 48h during the Impact Jam 4 on December 9 and 10, 2017  , in Paris.

You are a permaculture farmer with a little land to cultivate.

Choose what you grow wisely, to maximise the synergies between plants.

Your goal is to produce a diverse and healthy harvest.
